title: Graph the First Inequality
text: We must graph $$y \geq 2x-1$$. We graph the line as solid, and shade above since we have $$ \geq $$.\n##figure2.gif##

title: Graph the Second Inequality
text: We must graph $$y<x+1$$. We graph the line as dashed, and shade below since we have <.\n##figure4.gif##

title: The solution is region where shading overlaps: Dark blue.
